english.faq_intro: Welcome to the FAQ section! Here, you can find answers to common questions about using the bot.
english.faq_category_intro: Here are the frequently asked questions in this category.
english.choose_faq_question: Select a question to view its answer.
english.faq_profile_completion: How is my profile completion percentage calculated?
english.faq_profile_completion_answer: Your profile completion percentage is calculated based on how many required fields you have filled out, such as company name, city, contact number, employer type, about company, and verification documents.
english.faq_profile_strength: What does the profile strength bar mean?
english.faq_profile_strength_answer: The profile strength bar visually represents how complete your profile is. For example: ‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñë‚ñë‚ñë‚ñë‚ñë‚ñë 50%.
english.faq_edit_profile: How do I edit my company profile?
english.faq_edit_profile_answer: From the main menu, go to the 'Edit Profile' section. You can update fields like company name, location, contact number, and more.
english.faq_delete_account: How do I delete my account?
english.faq_delete_account_answer: Go to the profile menu, select 'Delete My Account,' and confirm your choice. Note that this action cannot be undone.
english.faq_active_vacancies: How do I check my active vacancies and new applications?
english.faq_active_vacancies_answer: When you open the main menu, you'll see the number of active vacancies and new applications displayed. For example: 'Active Vacancies: 3 ‚ú®' and 'New Applications: 5 üî•'.
english.faq_post_job: How do I post a new job vacancy?
english.faq_post_job_answer: You can post a job by selecting the 'Post Vacancy' option. You'll be guided step-by-step to provide details like job title, employment type, gender preference, quantity, level, description, qualifications, skills, salary, benefits, and application deadline.
english.faq_manage_vacancies: Can I manage my active vacancies?
english.faq_manage_vacancies_answer: Yes, under 'Manage Vacancies,' you can view all your active, pending, expired, and closed job listings. You can also check the number of applications received for each vacancy and perform actions like viewing applicants, closing a job, renewing an expired vacancy, or checking stats.
english.faq_view_applicants: How do I view applicants for my vacancies?
english.faq_view_applicants_answer: Yes, under 'Manage Vacancies,' select an active or approved job and click 'View Applicants' to see the list of candidates who applied.
english.faq_view_analytics: What kind of analytics can I view?
english.faq_view_analytics_answer: You can view metrics like active vacancies, total applications, hire rate, and average response time.
english.faq_export_data: Can I export my job postings or application data?
english.faq_export_data_answer: Yes, you can export your data in CSV format. Use the 'Export Data' option under the Analytics or Database Management section to download reports.
english.faq_change_language: Can I change the language of the bot?
english.faq_change_language_answer: Yes, you can change the language by selecting the 'Change Language' option. Supported languages include English, Amharic, Oromo, Tigrinya, Afar, and Somali.
english.faq_employer_tips: What are the employer tips of the day?
english.faq_employer_tips_answer: These are helpful suggestions to improve your recruitment process. Examples include writing effective job descriptions, enhancing your employer brand, and using AI in recruiting.
english.faq_renew_vacancy: How do I renew an expired job vacancy?
english.faq_renew_vacancy_answer: Yes, you can renew expired vacancies. Select the 'Renew' option for the expired job and choose a renewal duration (e.g., 30 days, 60 days, or custom). The new deadline will be updated accordingly.
english.faq_close_job: Can I close a job vacancy before the deadline?
english.faq_close_job_answer: Yes, you can close an active job vacancy at any time by selecting the 'Close Job' option under the job details menu. You‚Äôll need to confirm the action before proceeding.
english.faq_download_cv: Is it possible to download a candidate‚Äôs CV?
english.faq_download_cv_answer: Yes, if the candidate has uploaded a CV, you can download it directly from their application details page by clicking the 'Download CV' button.
english.faq_accept_reject_applicant: What happens after I accept or reject an applicant?
english.faq_accept_reject_applicant_answer: Accept: The candidate is notified of their selection, and you can send them an optional message. Reject: You‚Äôll be prompted to provide a rejection reason, which will be shared with the candidate.
english.faq_quick_action_suggestions_answer: These are personalized prompts to help you take immediate actions, such as reviewing new applications or posting a vacancy.
english.faq_main_menu_options: What options are available in the Employer Main Menu?
english.faq_main_menu_options_answer: From the Employer Main Menu, you can: View and manage your profile (e.g., edit details, check profile completion), post new job vacancies or manage existing ones, view analytics about your recruitment performance, and access help and tips for improving your hiring process.

english.js_faq_registration_steps: How do I register as a job seeker?
english.js_faq_registration_steps_answer:
To register:
1. Select 'Job Seeker' during registration
2. Provide DOB, gender, contact info, and languages
3. Optionally add qualifications, skills, experience, and documents
english.js_faq_profile_update: Can I edit my profile after registration?
english.js_faq_profile_update_answer: Yes - update contact info, skills, qualifications, and documents anytime via 'Edit Profile'
english.js_faq_document_upload: How do I upload my CV/portfolio?
english.js_faq_document_upload_answer: Upload during registration/profile updates, or provide a portfolio link
english.js_faq_optional_fields: Can I skip optional registration fields?
english.js_faq_optional_fields_answer: Yes, but completing all fields improves profile credibility and visibility
english.js_faq_job_application_process: How do I apply for jobs?
english.js_faq_job_application_process_answer:
1. Click job post
2. Write tailored cover letter
3. Submit through the bot
english.js_faq_application_status: How do I check application status?
english.js_faq_application_status_answer: View all applications with status (Pending/Approved/Rejected) in 'My Applications'
english.js_faq_application_outcome_answer: You'll receive confirmation. If selected, employer will provide next steps. If rejected, you'll get feedback
english.js_faq_application_export_answer: Yes - export as Excel file (.xlsx) from 'My Applications'
english.js_faq_job_search: How do I search for jobs?
english.js_faq_job_search_answer: Use keyword search for titles, skills, or industries. Save searches for notifications
english.js_faq_advanced_filters_answer:
Filter by:
- Job type (Full-time/Part-time/Remote)
- Salary range
- Experience level
english.js_faq_search_sorting_answer: Sort by: Newest postings or Highest paying jobs
english.js_faq_search_saving_answer: Yes - saved searches will notify you of new matching jobs
english.js_faq_account_deletion: How do I delete my account?
english.js_faq_account_deletion_answer: Use 'Delete My Account' in settings (permanent and irreversible)
english.js_faq_data_visibility_answer: Control employer visibility through privacy settings in account management
english.js_faq_ban_notification: What happens if I get banned?
english.js_faq_ban_notification_answer: You'll receive a ban message with reason and appeal option
english.js_faq_appeal_process: How do I appeal a ban?
english.js_faq_appeal_process_answer: Use the 'üìù Appeal Ban' button in the ban message to submit your case (max 500 characters)
english.js_faq_appeal_review: What happens after submitting an appeal?
english.js_faq_appeal_review_answer: Admins will review your appeal and notify you of their decision
english.js_faq_ban_removal_answer: Yes, if your appeal is successful the ban will be removed
english.js_faq_appeal_rejection: What if my appeal is rejected?
english.js_faq_appeal_rejection_answer: The ban remains in place with explanation - serious/repeated violations typically stay banned
english.js_faq_admin_ban_criteria: How do admins decide to ban users?
english.js_faq_admin_ban_criteria_answer: Bans occur for violations like spamming, inappropriate behavior, or platform misuse with clear reasons provided
english.js_faq_ban_reason_visibility: Will I know my ban reason?
english.js_faq_ban_reason_visibility_answer: Yes, ban notifications always include the specific violation reason
english.js_faq_admin_ban_tools_answer:
Admins can:
- Search and ban by ID/name/company
- View ban list with reasons
- Review appeals and modify bans
english.admin_faq_intro: Manage platform operations, users, and content moderation
english.admin_tip_database_backup: Regularly export data backups for security
english.admin_tip_post_moderation: Always verify job post validity before approval
english.admin_tip_broadcast_usage: Use broadcasts for important platform announcements
english.admin_tip_ban_management: Document ban reasons clearly for accountability
english.admin_faq_panel_overview_ans: Central hub for platform management including user/job moderation and system operations
english.admin_faq_menu_options_ans: Manage jobs, share posts, broadcast messages, handle database operations, and view reports
english.admin_faq_job_management_ans: Approve/reject posts, view details, handle invalid entries
english.admin_faq_post_sharing_ans: Manually forward approved posts to channels/groups
english.admin_faq_invalid_posts_ans: System skips invalid posts and notifies admins for review
english.admin_faq_database_options_ans: Manage users/jobs/vacancies/applications, export data, and perform backups
english.admin_faq_data_deletion_ans: Yes - use 'Clear Data' with caution (permanent deletion)
english.admin_faq_broadcast_feature_ans: Send messages to all users or specific groups for announcements
english.admin_faq_ban_process_ans: Review appeals, view ban history, and modify ban status
english.admin_faq_appeal_review_ans: Check appeal validity and update ban status accordingly
english.admin_faq_ban_tools_ans: Search users, view ban list, and modify ban status

somalia.faq_section: Qaybta Su'aalaha Inta Badan La Weydiiyo (FAQ)
somalia.faq_intro: Ku soo dhawoow qaybta FAQ! Halkan, waxaad ka heli kartaa jawaabaha su'aalaha caadiga ah ee ku saabsan isticmaalka bot-ka.
somalia.faq_category_intro: Waa kuwan su'aalaha inta badan la weydiiyo ee ku jira qaybtaan.
somalia.choose_faq_question: Dooro su'aal si aad u aragto jawaabteeda.
somalia.faq_profile_completion: Sidee loo xisaabiyaa boqolleyda dhammaystirka profile-kayga?
somalia.faq_profile_completion_answer: Boqolleyda dhammaystirka profile-kaaga waxaa lagu xisaabiyaa iyadoo lagu salaynayo inta goobood ee loo baahan yahay ee aad buuxisay, sida magaca shirkadda, magaalada, lambarka taleefanka, nooca shaqaaleeye, wax ku saabsan shirkadda, iyo dukumiintiyada xaqiijinta.
somalia.faq_profile_strength: Maxay ka dhigan tahay baarka xoogga profile-ka?
somalia.faq_profile_strength_answer: Baarka xoogga profile-ka wuxuu si muuqaal ah u metelaa sida profile-kaagu u dhammaystiran yahay. Tusaale ahaan: ‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñë‚ñë‚ñë‚ñë‚ñë‚ñë 50%.
somalia.faq_edit_profile: Sideen wax uga beddeli karaa profile-ka shirkaddayda?
somalia.faq_edit_profile_answer: Laga bilaabo menu-ga ugu weyn, aad qaybta 'Wax ka beddel Profile'. Waxaad cusbooneysiin kartaa goobo sida magaca shirkadda, goobta, lambarka taleefanka, iyo in ka badan.
somalia.faq_delete_account_answer: Aad menu-ga profile-ka, dooro 'Tirtir Account-kayga,' oo xaqiiji xulashadaada. Ogsoonow in ficilkan aan dib loo noqon karin.
somalia.faq_active_vacancies: Sideen u hubin karaa jagooyinkayga banaan ee firfircoon iyo codsiyada cusub?
somalia.faq_active_vacancies_answer: Markaad furto menu-ga ugu weyn, waxaad arki doontaa tirada jagooyinka banaan ee firfircoon iyo codsiyada cusub oo la soo bandhigay. Tusaale ahaan: 'Jagooyin Banaanaan oo Firfircoon: 3 ‚ú®' iyo 'Codsiyo Cusub: 5 üî•'.
somalia.faq_post_job: Sideen u dhajin karaa jago shaqo oo cusub?
somalia.faq_post_job_answer: Waxaad dhajin kartaa shaqo adigoo dooranaya xulashada 'Dhajiso Jago'. Waxaa laguu hagi doonaa tallaabo-tallaabo si aad u bixiso faahfaahin sida cinwaanka shaqada, nooca shaqada, doorbidka jinsiga, tirada, heerka, sharraxaadda, shuruudaha, xirfadaha, mushaharka, faa'iidooyinka, iyo waqtiga kama dambaysta ah ee codsiga.
somalia.faq_manage_vacancies: Miyay suuragal tahay inaan maamulo jagooyinkayga banaan ee firfircoon?
somalia.faq_manage_vacancies_answer: Haa, hoosta 'Maamul Jagooyinka Banaan,' waxaad ku arki kartaa dhammaan liisaskaaga shaqo ee firfircoon, kuwa sugaya, kuwa dhacay, iyo kuwa xiran. Waxaad sidoo kale hubin kartaa tirada codsiyada la helay jago kasta iyo inaad fuliso ficillo sida eegista codsadayaasha, xiritaanka shaqada, cusbooneysiinta jago dhacday, ama hubinta tirakoobka.
somalia.faq_view_applicants: Sideen u arki karaa codsadayaasha jagooyinkayga banaan?
somalia.faq_view_applicants_answer: Haa, hoosta 'Maamul Jagooyinka Banaan,' dooro shaqo firfircoon ama la oggolaaday oo guji 'Eeg Codsadayaasha' si aad u aragto liiska musharraxiinta codsaday.
somalia.faq_view_analytics: Noockee falanqayn ah ayaan arki karaa?
somalia.faq_view_analytics_answer: Waxaad arki kartaa qiyaaso sida jagooyinka banaan ee firfircoon, wadar ahaan codsiyada, heerka shaqaalaynta, iyo celcelis wakhtiga jawaabta.
somalia.faq_export_data: Ma dhoofin karaa xayeysiisyadayda shaqo ama xogta codsiga?
somalia.faq_export_data_answer: Haa, waxaad dhoofin kartaa xogtaada qaabka CSV. Isticmaal xulashada 'Dhoofi Xogta' oo ku hoos jirta Falanqaynta ama Qaybta Maareynta Database-ka si aad u soo dejiso warbixinnada.
somalia.faq_change_language_answer: Haa, waxaad beddeli kartaa luqadda adigoo dooranaya xulashada 'Beddel Luqadda'. Luqadaha la taageeray waxaa ka mid ah Ingiriis, Amxaari, Oromo, Tigrinya, Afar, iyo Soomaali.
somalia.faq_employer_tips: Waa maxay talooyinka shaqaaleeyaha ee maalinta?
somalia.faq_employer_tips_answer: Kuwani waa talooyin waxtar leh oo lagu hagaajinayo habkaaga shaqaalaynta. Tusaalooyinka waxaa ka mid ah qorista sharraxaadyo shaqo oo wax ku ool ah, kor u qaadista sumcaddaada shaqaaleeye, iyo isticmaalka AI-ga shaqaalaynta.
somalia.faq_renew_vacancy: Sideen u cusbooneysiin karaa jago shaqo oo dhacday?
somalia.faq_renew_vacancy_answer: Haa, waxaad cusbooneysiin kartaa jagooyinka banaan ee dhacay. Dooro xulashada 'Cusbooneysii' ee shaqada dhacday oo dooro muddada cusbooneysiinta (tusaale, 30 maalmood, 60 maalmood, ama mid gaar ah). Waqtiga kama dambaysta ah ee cusub ayaa si toos ah loo cusbooneysiin doonaa.
somalia.faq_close_job: Ma xidhi karaa jago shaqo ka hor waqtiga kama dambaysta ah?
somalia.faq_close_job_answer: Haa, waxaad xidhi kartaa jago shaqo oo firfircoon wakhti kasta adigoo dooranaya xulashada 'Xidh Shaqada' ee ku hoos jirta menu-ga faahfaahinta shaqada. Waxaad u baahan doontaa inaad xaqiijiso ficilka ka hor intaadan sii wadin.
somalia.faq_download_cv: Miyay suuragal tahay in la soo dejiyo CV-ga musharrax?
somalia.faq_download_cv_answer: Haa, haddii musharraxu soo galiyay CV, waxaad si toos ah uga soo dejisan kartaa bogga faahfaahinta codsigooda adigoo gujinaya badhanka 'Soo Deji CV'.
somalia.faq_accept_reject_applicant: Maxaa dhacaya ka dib markaan aqbalo ama diido codsade?
somalia.faq_accept_reject_applicant_answer: Aqbal: Musharraxa waa la ogeysiiyaa in la xushay, waxaadna u diri kartaa fariin ikhtiyaari ah. Diid: Waxaa lagu weydiin doonaa inaad bixiso sababta diidmada, taasoo lala wadaagi doono musharraxa.
somalia.faq_quick_action_suggestions: Waa maxay talooyinka ficil degdeg ah?
somalia.faq_quick_action_suggestions_answer: Kuwani waa talooyin shakhsi ah oo kaa caawinaya inaad qaaddo tallaabooyin degdeg ah, sida dib u eegista codsiyada cusub ama dhajinta jago banaan.
somalia.faq_main_menu_options: Waa maxay xulashooyinka laga heli karo Menu-ga Guud ee Shaqaaleeyaha?
somalia.faq_main_menu_options_answer: Laga bilaabo Menu-ga Guud ee Shaqaaleeyaha, waxaad awood u leedahay inaad: Aragto oo aad maamusho profile-kaaga (tusaale, wax ka beddel faahfaahinta, hubi dhammaystirka profile-ka), aad dhajiso jagooyin shaqo oo cusub ama aad maamusho kuwa jira, aad aragto falanqaynta ku saabsan waxqabadkaaga shaqaalaynta, oo aad hesho caawimaad iyo talooyin ku saabsan hagaajinta habkaaga shaqaalaynta.
somalia.help_intro: Ku soo dhawoow Xarunta Caawimaadda! Halkan, waxaad ka heli kartaa jawaabaha su'aalaha caadiga ah oo aad heli kartaa caawimaad.
somalia.tip_portfolio: Talo: Portfolio xooggan ayaa kordhiya fursadahaaga inaad shaqo hesho.
somalia.tip_communication: Talo: Xidhiidhka cad ee lala yeesho macaamiisha wuxuu horseedi karaa natiijooyin mashruuc oo wanaagsan.
somalia.tip_profile_completion: Talo: Dhammaystirka profile-kaaga wuxuu kordhiyaa muuqashadaada shaqaaleeyayaasha.
somalia.tip_negotiation: Talo: Noqo mid ku kalsoon laakiin dabacsanaan muuji inta lagu jiro gorgortanka mushaharka.
somalia.tip_post_job: Talo: Bixi faahfaahin shaqo oo cad si aad u soo jiidato musharraxiin u qalma.
somalia.choose_faq_type: Fadlan dooro nooca FAQ-ga aad u baahan tahay:
somalia.under_development_message: üöß Qaybtaan waa la hagaajinayaa. Fadlan dib u hubi mar dambe!
somalia.select_faq_category: Fadlan dooro qaybta FAQ-ga ee ku habboon doorkaaga:
somalia.tip_manage_vacancies: Si joogto ah u cusbooneysii xayeysiisyadaada shaqo si ay u sii ahaadaan kuwo firfircoon
somalia.tip_view_analytics: Toddobaadkiiba mar hubi falanqayntaada si aad ula socoto waxqabadka
somalia.tip_change_language: Waxaad beddeli kartaa luqadda wakhti kasta goobaha dejinta
somalia.js_faq_intro: Ka hel jawaabaha su'aalaha caadiga ah ee ku saabsan raadinta shaqada, codsiyada, iyo maareynta profile-ka.
somalia.js_tip_complete_profile: Buuxi dhammaan qaybaha profile-ka si aad u kordhiso muuqashadaada shaqaaleeyayaasha
somalia.js_tip_application_strategy: U habee warqadahaada daboolka sharraxaadda shaqo kasta si aad u hesho natiijooyin wanaagsan
somalia.js_tip_search_filters: Isticmaal shaandhaynta horumarsan si aad si degdeg ah u hesho shaqooyin ku habboon doorbidkaaga
somalia.js_tip_document_upload: Hay CV-gaaga oo cusub oo hubi in linkiga portfolio-gaagu uu shaqeynayo
somalia.js_tip_profile_visibility: Si joogto ah u cusbooneysii xirfadaha/waayo-aragnimada si aad u ahaato mid la xiriira
somalia.js_faq_registration_steps: Sideen isaga diiwaan gelin karaa shaqo doon ahaan?
somalia.js_faq_registration_steps_answer:
Si aad isaga diiwaan geliso:
1. Dooro 'Shaqo Doon' inta lagu jiro diiwaangelinta
2. Bixi taariikhda dhalashada, jinsiga, macluumaadka xiriirka, iyo luqadaha
3. Ikhtiyaar ahaan ku dar aqoon-isweydaarsi, xirfado, waayo-aragnimo, iyo dukumiintiyo
somalia.js_faq_profile_update: Ma wax ka beddeli karaa profile-kayga ka dib diiwaangelinta?
somalia.js_faq_profile_update_answer: Haa - cusbooneysii macluumaadka xiriirka, xirfadaha, aqoon-isweydaarsiga, iyo dukumiintiyada wakhti kasta adigoo isticmaalaya 'Wax ka beddel Profile'
somalia.js_faq_document_upload_answer: Soo geli inta lagu jiro diiwaangelinta/cusbooneysiinta profile-ka, ama bixi linkiga portfolio-ga
somalia.js_faq_optional_fields: Ma ka boodi karaa goobaha diiwaangelinta ee ikhtiyaariga ah?
somalia.js_faq_optional_fields_answer: Haa, laakiin buuxinta dhammaan goobaha waxay hagaajinaysaa kalsoonida iyo muuqashada profile-ka
somalia.js_faq_job_application_process_answer:
1. Guji xayeysiiska shaqada
2. Qor warqad dabool oo ku habboon
3. Ku soo gudbi bot-ka
somalia.js_faq_application_status: Sideen u hubin karaa xaaladda codsigayga?
somalia.js_faq_application_status_answer: Ku arag dhammaan codsiyada xaaladdooda ('Sugaya'/‚ÄòLa Oggolaaday‚Äô/'La Diiday') 'Codsiyadayda'
somalia.js_faq_application_outcome: Maxaa dhacaya ka dib markaan codsado?
somalia.js_faq_application_outcome_answer: Waxaad heli doontaa xaqiijin. Haddii lagu xusho, shaqaaleeyuhu wuxuu bixin doonaa tallaabooyinka xiga. Haddii lagu diido, waxaad heli doontaa jawaab celin
somalia.js_faq_application_export_answer: Haa - u dhoofi sidii faylka Excel (.xlsx) 'Codsiyadayda'
somalia.js_faq_job_search_answer: Isticmaal raadinta ereyga muhiimka ah cinwaannada, xirfadaha, ama warshadaha. Kaydi raadinta si aad u hesho ogeysiisyo
somalia.js_faq_advanced_filters: Waa maxay shaandhaynta raadinta ee la heli karo?
somalia.js_faq_advanced_filters_answer:
Shaandhee adigoo isticmaalaya:
- Nooca shaqada (Shaqo buuxda/Shaqo qayb ah/Shaqo fog)
- Heerka mushaharka
- Heerka waayo-aragnimada
somalia.js_faq_search_sorting: Ma kala saari karaa natiijooyinka raadinta?
somalia.js_faq_search_sorting_answer: Kala saar adigoo isticmaalaya: Xayeysiisyada ugu dambeeyay ama shaqooyinka mushaharka ugu sarreeya
somalia.js_faq_search_saving_answer: Haa - raadinta la kaydiyay ayaa ku ogeysiin doonta shaqooyinka cusub ee ku habboon
somalia.js_faq_account_deletion_answer: Isticmaal 'Tirtir Account-kayga' goobaha dejinta (waa mid joogto ah oo aan dib loo noqon karin)
somalia.js_faq_data_visibility_answer: Xakamaynta muuqashadaada shaqaaleeyaha adigoo isticmaalaya goobaha sirta ee maareynta account-ka
somalia.js_faq_ban_notification: Maxaa dhacaya haddii la i mamnuuco?
somalia.js_faq_ban_notification_answer: Waxaad heli doontaa fariin mamnuucid ah oo leh sababta iyo ikhtiyaarka racfaanka
somalia.js_faq_appeal_process: Sideen u racfaan qaadan karaa mamnuucid?
somalia.js_faq_appeal_process_answer: Isticmaal badhanka 'üìù Racfaan Mamnuucid' ee ku jira fariinta mamnuucidda si aad u soo gudbiso dacwadaada (ugu badnaan 500 oo xaraf)
somalia.js_faq_appeal_review: Maxaa dhacaya ka dib markaan soo gudbiyo racfaan?
somalia.js_faq_appeal_review_answer: Maamulayaasha ayaa dib u eegi doona racfaankaaga oo ku ogeysiin doona go'aankooda
somalia.js_faq_ban_removal: Ma la qaadi karaa mamnuuciddii la i saaray?
somalia.js_faq_ban_removal_answer: Haa, haddii racfaankaagu ku guuleysto mamnuuciddii waa lagaa qaadi doonaa
somalia.js_faq_appeal_rejection: Maxaa dhacaya haddii racfaankayga la diido?
somalia.js_faq_appeal_rejection_answer: Mamnuuciddii ayaa sii jiraysa iyadoo la bixinayo sharraxaad - xadgudubyada halista ah/soo noqnoqda badanaa way sii mamnuucnaadaan
somalia.js_faq_admin_ban_criteria: Sidee maamulayaashu u go'aansadaan inay mamnuucaan isticmaaleyaasha?
somalia.js_faq_admin_ban_criteria_answer: Mamnuucidyada waxay dhacaan xadgudubyo sida faafin spam-ka, dhaqan aan habboonayn, ama si khaldan u isticmaalka madal iyadoo la bixinayo sababo cad
somalia.js_faq_ban_reason_visibility: Miyaan ogaan doonaa sababta mamnuuciddii la i saaray?
somalia.js_faq_ban_reason_visibility_answer: Haa, ogeysiisyada mamnuuciddii had iyo jeer waxay ku jiraan sababta xadgudubka gaarka ah
somalia.js_faq_admin_ban_tools_answer:
Maamulayaashu way awoodaan:
- Inay raadiyaan oo ay mamnuucaan iyagoo isticmaalaya ID/magac/shirkad
- Inay arkaan liiska mamnuucidyada oo leh sababaha
- Inay dib u eegaan racfaannada oo ay wax ka beddelaan mamnuucidyada
somalia.admin_faq_intro: Maaree hawlgallada madal, isticmaaleyaasha, iyo dhexdhexaadinta macluumaadka
somalia.admin_tip_database_backup: Si joogto ah u dhoofi kaydka xogta si aad u ilaaliso amniga
somalia.admin_tip_post_moderation: Had iyo jeer hubi saxnaanta xayeysiiska shaqada ka hor intaadan oggolaan
somalia.admin_tip_broadcast_usage: Isticmaal baahinta ogeysiisyada madal ee muhiimka ah
somalia.admin_tip_ban_management: Si cad u diiwaan geli sababaha mamnuucida si loola xisaabtamo
somalia.admin_faq_panel_overview_ans: Xarun dhexe oo lagu maareeyo madal ay ku jiraan dhexdhexaadinta isticmaalaha/shaqada iyo hawlgallada nidaamka
somalia.admin_faq_menu_options_ans: Maaree shaqooyinka, wadaag xayeysiisyada, baahi fariimaha, maaree hawlgallada database-ka, oo arag warbixinnada
somalia.admin_faq_job_management_ans: Oggolaan/diid xayeysiisyada, arag faahfaahinta, maaree gelinta aan saxda ahayn
somalia.admin_faq_post_sharing: Sidee loo wadaagaa xayeysiisyada la oggolaaday?
somalia.admin_faq_post_sharing_ans: Gacanta u gudbi xayeysiisyada la oggolaaday kanaalada/kooxaha
somalia.admin_faq_invalid_posts: Sidee loo maareeyaa xayeysiisyada aan saxda ahayn?
somalia.admin_faq_invalid_posts_ans: Nidaamku wuxuu ka boodaa xayeysiisyada aan saxda ahayn wuxuuna ogeysiiyaa maamulayaasha si ay dib u eegis ugu sameeyaan
somalia.admin_faq_database_options: Waa maxay hawlgallada database-ka ee la heli karo?
somalia.admin_faq_database_options_ans: Maaree isticmaaleyaasha/shaqooyinka/jagooyinka banaan/codsiyada, dhoofi xogta, oo samee kayd
somalia.admin_faq_data_deletion_ans: Haa - isticmaal 'Masax Xogta' si taxaddar leh (tirtirid joogto ah)
somalia.admin_faq_broadcast_feature_ans: U dir fariimo dhammaan isticmaaleyaasha ama kooxo gaar ah ogeysiisyada
somalia.admin_faq_ban_process_ans: Dib u eeg racfaannada, arag taariikhda mamnuucidyada, oo wax ka beddel xaaladda mamnuucida
somalia.admin_faq_appeal_review_ans: Hubi saxnaanta racfaanka oo cusbooneysii xaaladda mamnuucida si waafaqsan
somalia.admin_faq_ban_tools: Waa maxay qalabka maareynta mamnuucida ee jira?
somalia.admin_faq_ban_tools_ans: Raadi isticmaaleyaasha, arag liiska mamnuucidyada, oo wax ka beddel xaaladda mamnuucida
somalia.contact_admin_intro: Ma u baahan tahay caawimaad? Kooxdayada taageerada ayaa diyaar u ah inay ku caawiyaan. Fadlan dooro qaybta si fiican u sharraxaysa dhibaatadaada.
somalia.select_contact_category: Fadlan dooro qaybta si fiican ugu habboon su'aashaada:
somalia.priority_explanation: Caadi = 24 saacadood gudahood, Sare = 12 saacadood gudahood, Degdeg = 6 saacadood gudahood (dhibaatooyinka halista ah oo keliya)
somalia.be_specific: Ka hadal si gaar ah dhibaatadaada
somalia.avoid_spam: Ka fogow inaad dirto fariimo badan oo ku saabsan dhibaato isku mid ah
